title: Memoirs of a Sex Slave: Confessions of a Submissive Woman
description: Billierosie rocked the BDSM world with her collection, Fetish Worship, and she proves just how good she can be - if not better, in her new nove. As the author says. The author says, "I know people who have had their lives changed for the better, when they finally embraced their fetish." And with this, her wonderful new novel, she shows not just that understanding but how great a writer she is!
author: Billierosie
